DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the interventions of Snoezelen, structured reminiscence therapy and 10-minutes activation are effective to reduce apathy in long term care residents with dementia.
DOC.detailed_description: Design: Cluster-randomized controlled trial with 20 nursing homes in Saxony and Saxony-Anhalt (Germany).
DOC.criteria: Dementia Informed consent by legal guardian MMSE ≤ 24 Korsakoff's syndrome Age ≤ 55 years Cognitive impairment other cause than dementia
